primary.name: Electric Blue
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, Active States, Key Highlights

secondary.name: Vitality Green
secondary.usage: Success states, Growth metrics, Positive trends

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.default: bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-xl shadow-sm p-6
cards.interactive: bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-xl shadow-sm p-6 hover:border-blue-200 hover:shadow-md transition-all cursor-pointer

inputs.default: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 rounded-lg h-11

badges.default: bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
badges.success: bg-green-50 text-green-700 border border-green-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
badges.warning: bg-amber-50 text-amber-700 border border-amber-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

rules: KPI Cards (Active Students, Workouts) take top row
Recent Activity list takes full height on side or bottom
Use whitespace to separate data density

student_profile.structure: Header with Avatar -> Tabs (Info, Workout, Evolution)
rules: Tabs must be large enough for touch targets
Content area has white background with padding
Mobile: Fixed bottom bar with icons for Dashboard, Students, Workouts, Profile
Desktop: Clean sidebar with logo at top

login_hero.alt: Personal trainer adjusting weights in gym

universal_guidelines: Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a modern, fitness-tech feel.
Primary Blue (#2563EB) is for ACTIONS. Green (#16A34A) is for RESULTS/STATUS.
Avoid pure black. Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) for high contrast text.
Cards must have 'p-6' padding minimum to feel spacious.
Mobile First: All tables must have a card-view alternative for mobile screens.
Interactive elements must have a hover state that includes a slight color shift or lift.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, only for subtle accents or buttons.
